title: Intensive Chinese Character Learning Course Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Chinese character recognition ability and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Meets the intermediate-level Chinese character learning needs required for workplace applications by in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners will analyze and explain the components (radicals, stroke order) of 50 essential Chinese characters with 80% accuracy through game-based activities.
Learners will apply 30 Chinese vocabulary words contextually while performing digital quizzes and collaborative missions.
Creating practical documents (e.g., reports/proposals) using learned Chinese characters through project-based assessment

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) platform (built-in gamification features)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
